lab.title: Lab
lab.comment: Required. See lab.json for list of available identifiers.

donors.title: Donors
donors.description: Donor(s) the sample was derived from.

sample_procurement_interval.title: Sample Procurement Interval
sample_procurement_interval.description: Time passing from the moment of sample collection till the freezing or initiation of the experiment with the sample.

sample_procurement_interval_units.title: Sample Procurement Interval Units
sample_procurement_interval_units.description: The unit in which the sample procurement interval was reported.

suspension_type.title: Suspension Type
suspension_type.description: Type of suspension - single cells or single nuclei.

genetic_modification.title: Genetic Modification
genetic_modification.description: Genetic modification applied to this biosample.

enrichment_method.title: Enrichment Method
enrichment_method.description: Method used for cell enrichment or sorting.

enriched_cell_types.title: Enriched Cell Types
enriched_cell_types.description: Cell types that were enriched in this sample. Must reference ControlledTerm objects with Cell Ontology (CL) terms.

items.title: Enriched Cell Type
items.description: Reference to ControlledTerm with Cell Ontology (CL) term for enriched cell type.
items.comment: Must link to ControlledTerm with ontology_source='CL'. See controlled_term.json for available identifiers.

depleted_cell_types.title: Depleted Cell Types
depleted_cell_types.description: Cell types that were depleted from this sample. Must reference ControlledTerm objects with Cell Ontology (CL) terms.

items.title: Depleted Cell Type
items.description: Reference to ControlledTerm with Cell Ontology (CL) term for depleted cell type.
items.comment: Must link to ControlledTerm with ontology_source='CL'. See controlled_term.json for available identifiers.

enrichment_markers.title: Enrichment Markers
enrichment_markers.description: Markers used for cell enrichment or depletion.

marker.title: Marker
marker.description: Cell surface marker or protein used for enrichment.

expression_level.title: Expression Level
expression_level.description: Level of marker expression used for selection.

experimental_conditions.title: Experimental Conditions
experimental_conditions.description: Environmental and experimental parameters affecting the sample.

items.title: Experimental Condition
items.description: Reference to experimental condition applied to this sample.
